name: Burn It Down (itch)
description:
Game by Seth Konoza

Art by Kenney.nl

Sound from Freesound.org

Theme Chosen: Burn It Down

Achievements: Tango (I programmed and created the game,  borrowed art assets from Kenney.nl website)

Simple Goal: burn/explode the crates below the goal line in the quickest way possible. The quicker you are the more points you receive. Left-click boxes to watch them burn.

Also available to be played online at https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/712480?updated=1528660856
